entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then periods of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
